title: Baschanow - I was Stalin's secretary (Stalin's rise to pow
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german language. English title would be: I was Stalin\'s secretary (1977). Boris Baschanow was the organizational secretary of the Communist party\'s Politbiro in its deciding years of developement. In this rare and even banned book he describes his first-hand experiences of Stalin\'s murderous rise to absolute power and how the author eventually became disillusioned with communism. This five years memoirs are among the most extraordinary historical documents, paralleling that of Albert Speer\'s memoirs of the Nazi era. 290 pages.
